I'm ready to assist! I'm Claude Code, operating in read-only mode as a file search specialist. I can help you navigate and explore the codebase in `/Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent/packages/desktop/src-tauri`.

I'm equipped to:
- Search files using glob patterns
- Search code content with regex using grep
- Read specific file contents
- Run read-only bash commands

I see you're on the `main` branch with a modified file in the UI hooks directory (`../ui/src/hooks/useAutoUpdate.tsx`). The repository appears to be a desktop application built with Tauri.

What would you like me to search for or explore in this codebase?
